name: Plane 42
description:
Game is meant to be played in small screen  :D

Hey there , 

This was made for Tri Jam,

Controls:

Up arrow to move up and Down arrow to move down.

Downloadable version works better with music and fixes minor bugs :)

Theme: There is a twist , I wont spoil how its interpreted since its related to the story 

so Play and see yourself ;)

I had a lot of fun and gained a lot of takeaways from this.

Have fun playing it !
